Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: A group of people on Twitter shared a link to an external source discussing the increased cost of renovations to the Australian Parliament building. One user called for changes to the gas tax system arguing that multinational corporations shouldn't be exempt from paying. However several users simply shared the link without providing any additional context. Overall the discussion highlights the power of social media to disseminate information and spark conversation even if not everyone adds to the discussion.
